tool_description: Basic API for RA Application that returns data chunks based on hid for the chunk
name: Mark Scarsi RA 3
title: Mark Scarsi RA 3

api_list.name: Text Chunk
api_list.description: Returns a text chunk of specified HID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mark-scarsi-ra-3.p.rapidapi.com/33BFF6QPI1YEFYISIWWDVQKGH8RW3Z"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mark-scarsi-ra-3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://mark-scarsi-ra-3.p.rapidapi.com/{hid}"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
